Tap on the number "19" on the clock face to set the hour to 19.

Tap on the number "19" on the clock face to set the hour to 19.
Tap the "OK" button to confirm the selected end time of 19:45.
Tap on the Description field to enter the event description.
Type 'We will plan contract details. Let's be punctual.' into the description field.
